title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 4 Fun physical crypto coin lots up for grabs!! LOT 1: 2021 BitcoinSV Coingeek Conference NYC coin + coa #20/20LOT 2: 2019 Manz Coin Lit #77 coin + coa "GPGL" LOT 3: 2018 Bitcoin Penny 1/4oz silver coinLOT 4: 2020 BCmint T#46 coin*coin/hologram do have small marks on them*STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 10th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 3: 0.001Lot 4: 0.001Any more info on the BC mint coin? I checked their webpage but didn't find any info on mintage or who's manufacturing it etc.Looks good enough to put in my collection, though.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on June 05, 2023, 02:10:34 PMAny more info on the BC mint coin? I checked their webpage but didn't find any info on mintage or who's manufacturing it etc.Looks good enough to put in my collection, though. Yes.Here are 2 threads that should give some decent information about the project:BCmint main: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5286395BCmint T-series: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5324468

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Thanks. The pics in main thread from Mopar really look cool.

comments.body: Lot 2: 0.001 btc Get Paid, Get Laid.  The only things that matter in life.
